import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; export default function ProjectCard({ image, title, content, date, urlText, url }) { return

{title}

{content}
{date}
} ProjectCard.protoTypes = { image: PropTypes.string, title: PropTypes.string, content: PropTypes.string, date: PropTypes.string, urlText: PropTypes.string, url: PropTypes.string }
